Package KI304.Kudyk.Lab3

Class TouchScreen

java.lang.Object
KI304.Kudyk.Lab3.Monitor
KI304.Kudyk.Lab3.TouchScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
Touchable
public class TouchScreen extends Monitor implements Touchable
Class TouchScreen extends Monitor and implements Touchable interface. Models a touchscreen device with basic touch interaction.
